channel.title: RadioPublic Spotlight
channel.description: A blended playlist of shows that you might like.

item.title: Ace on the House - If you enjoyed the Man Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Ace on the House - If you enjoyed the Man Show

item.title: Modern Love - If you enjoy Sex and the City, Broad City, Girls
item.description: Explore the joys and tribulations of love in these deeply personal essays. A collaboration of The New York Times and WBUR in Boston, Modern Love: The Podcast features the popular New York Times column, with readings by notable personalities and updates from the essayists themselves. Join host Meghna Chakrabarti (WBUR) and Modern Love editor Daniel Jones (NYT) and fall in love at first listen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Modern Love - If you enjoy Sex and the City, Broad City, Girls
item.itunes:summary: Explore the joys and tribulations of love in these deeply personal essays. A collaboration of The New York Times and WBUR in Boston, Modern Love: The Podcast features the popular New York Times column, with readings by notable personalities and updates from the essayists themselves. Join host Meghna Chakrabarti (WBUR) and Modern Love editor Daniel Jones (NYT) and fall in love at first listen.

item.title: Serial - If you enjoy Dateline NBC, 48 Hours, 20/20, 60 Minutes
item.description: Serial is a podcast from the creators of This American Life, hosted by Sarah Koenig. Serial unfolds one story - a true story - over the course of a whole season. The show follows the plot and characters wherever they lead, through many surprising twists and turns. Sarah won't know what happens at the end of the story until she gets there, not long before you get there with her. Each week she'll bring you the latest chapter, so it's important to listen in, starting with Episode 1. New episodes are released on Thursday mornings.
item.itunes:subtitle: Serial - If you enjoy Dateline NBC, 48 Hours, 20/20, 60 Minutes
item.itunes:summary: Serial is a podcast from the creators of This American Life, hosted by Sarah Koenig. Serial unfolds one story - a true story - over the course of a whole season. The show follows the plot and characters wherever they lead, through many surprising twists and turns. Sarah won't know what happens at the end of the story until she gets there, not long before you get there with her. Each week she'll bring you the latest chapter, so it's important to listen in, starting with Episode 1. New episodes are released on Thursday mornings.

item.title: 99% Invisible - Popular with designers, architects, engineers and people who like the TV show How Stuff Works.
item.description: Design is everywhere in our lives, perhaps most importantly in the places where we’ve just stopped noticing. 99% Invisible (99 Percent Invisible) is a weekly exploration of the process and power of design and architecture. From award winning producer Roman Mars, KALW in San Francisco, and Radiotopia from PRX. Learn more: http://99percentinvisible.org Proud member of PRX’s Radiotopia.
item.itunes:subtitle: 99% Invisible - Popular with designers, architects, engineers and people who like the TV show How Stuff Works.
